select '${childCatentryId}' AS catentry_id, tabfordeletion.identifier from ( select attrval.identifier, attrvaldesc.language_id, attr.identifier as attr_identifier, attrvaldesc.value as attr_attrvalue, attrvaldesc.stringvalue, attrvaldesc.sequence as value_sequence from catentryattr left join catentry on catentryattr.catentry_id = catentry.catentry_id left join attr on catentryattr.attr_id = attr.attr_id left join attrval on catentryattr.attrval_id = attrval.attrval_id left join (select * from attrvaldesc where attrvaldesc.language_id = -1) attrvaldesc on attrvaldesc.attrval_id = attrval.attrval_id where catentry.markfordelete = 0 AND attr.identifier not in ('EMR Country', 'EMR Platform', 'EMR Product Status', 'EMR Region', 'EMR TabSequence', 'EMR Locale') AND catentryattr.catentry_id IN (${parentCatentryId})
INTERSECT
select attrval.identifier, attrvaldesc.language_id, attr.identifier as attr_identifier, attrvaldesc.value as attr_attrvalue, attrvaldesc.stringvalue, attrvaldesc.sequence as value_sequence from catentryattr left join catentry on catentryattr.catentry_id = catentry.catentry_id left join attr on catentryattr.attr_id = attr.attr_id left join attrval on catentryattr.attrval_id = attrval.attrval_id left join (select * from attrvaldesc where attrvaldesc.language_id = -1) attrvaldesc on attrvaldesc.attrval_id = attrval.attrval_id where catentry.markfordelete = 0 AND attr.identifier not in ('EMR Country', 'EMR Platform', 'EMR Product Status', 'EMR Region', 'EMR TabSequence', 'EMR Locale') AND catentryattr.catentry_id IN (${childCatentryId}) ) tabfordeletion

select catentry.partnumber, attrval.identifier, attrvaldesc.language_id, attr.identifier as attr_identifier, attr.field1, attr.field2, attr.field3, attrvaldesc.value as attr_attrvalue, attrvaldesc.stringvalue, attrvaldesc.sequence as value_sequence, CASE WHEN ATTRVAL.IDENTIFIER LIKE '%Descriptive%' THEN 'Descriptive' ELSE 'Defining' END ATTRUSAGE from catentryattr left join catentry on catentryattr.catentry_id = catentry.catentry_id left join attr on catentryattr.attr_id = attr.attr_id left join attrval on catentryattr.attrval_id = attrval.attrval_id left join (select * from attrvaldesc where attrvaldesc.language_id = -1) attrvaldesc on attrvaldesc.attrval_id = attrval.attrval_id where catentry.markfordelete = 0 AND catentryattr.catentry_id = ? AND attrval.identifier = ?
